channel.title: AI Infrastructure on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AI Infrastructure on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Developers joke about “coding like cavemen” as AI service suffers major outage
item.description: Anthropic outage takes down AI tools some developers rely on to create software.

item.title: At $250 million, top AI salaries dwarf those of the Manhattan Project and the Space Race
item.description: A 24 year-old AI researcher will earn 327x what Oppenheimer made while developing the atomic bomb.

item.title: AI in Wyoming may soon use more electricity than state’s human residents
item.description: Proposed datacenter would demand 5x Wyoming’s current power use at full deployment.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
item.description: “Easy to throw around numbers, but this is a gigantic infrastructure project.”

item.title: Chinese firms rush for Nvidia chips as US prepares to lift ban
item.description: H20 chips, designed to skirt export bans, are back after Trump meets with CEO.
